unittitle.emph: American Ladies and Gentlemen's Pocket Almanac and Elegent Belles Lettres

did.abstract: One pocket almanac for the year 1801 titled The American Ladies and Gentlemen's Pocket Almanac and Elegent Belles Lettres, published in New York City.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single item.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: American Ladies and Gentlemen's Pocket Almanac and Elegent Belles Lettres, 1802, 1977.586, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One pocket almanac for the year 1801 titled The American Ladies and Gentlemen's Pocket Almanac and Elegent Belles Lettres, published in New York City. Decorated with engravings and containing various handwritten notes.
